thread.title: Mary Dalgleish
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Mary Dalgleish

author: Mary Dalgleish
title: Mary Dalgleish
text: Website prices very good and my order arrived promptly. Unfortunately I had to return item as it didn't fit. It was great to have a pre paid post label for return and my money was refunded in super quick time. I have no hesitation in recommending Country Attire.
